attacks.name: Furious Flailing
attacks.special: Targets every Character (friend or foe) within 2".

attacks.name: Pummel
attacks.special: If the target is on a smaller base size, move them back 2" after this Attack has been made.

attacks.name: Claw Slash
attacks.special: If a Critical Hit is rolled, remove 1 Armour or Shield from the target.

traits.name: Long Arms
traits.description: Jungle Trolls may make Melee Attacks against targets up to 2” away, even if they aren’t in base contact. Attacks may still be made if there is a friendly Character between the Character and the target.
